channel.title: Recent server status?
channel.description: Recently, I have noticed lots of issues with the connectivity of the server here. I receive many errors with connections to the SMF database and was curious if the server is just going through some rough times or what.

item.title: Recent server status?
item.dc:creator: @pookey71 Pookey71
item.description:
@pookey71 wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:6, topic:53462”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=75400.msg844050#msg844050 date=1170211391]
Well appearntly it’s going to be fixed soon.

These errors have been happening since day one. Mopar always says there’s some solution that will fix it, but so far noone have worked. Appearntly now all he needs to do is get some more ram and it’ll be fixed, but I still have some doubts. And if it’s fixed, I bet the errors will be back within a month.
[/quote]

They have been fixed a few times. Then the website gets busier, I get more ram and the problem is fixed. Then the website gets busier, I get more ram and the problem is fixed.

it’s a while(true) thing…

But when the latest RAM gets installed it should be fixed for quite a while. :)[/quote]
Soon you there wont be enough ram in teh world to help you :S

Read full topic
